nodes.text: The Arg'garok was a large Gamorrean vibro-ax designed for use by beings with tremendous strength and a low center of gravity, and was used by many Gamorrean warriors. It required tremendous skill and physical strength to wield effectively. Non-Gamorreans often had great trouble using the Arg'garok and only the strongest and best-trained warriors could use it effectively.
In Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, the Jedi Exile has the ability to wield two Arg'garoks or any other ax-styled weapons at the same time.
